ygData.subject: RE: So how bad are the changes for us?
ygData.msgSnippet: Shaman s pets got whacked hard too, no more giving them daggers to decrease delay. Looks like everyone but Mages got hit by this nerf. Oh, enchanters are quiet
ygData.messageBody:
Shaman's pets got whacked hard too, no more giving them daggers to decrease
delay.

Looks like everyone but Mages got hit by this nerf.

Oh, enchanters are quiet cuz someone (ie Brad) over at Verant likes them a
sh*t ton (IMO). I played a Shaman to 50, and just recently started an
enchanter (19 now). Seems like shaman's got hit with alot more nerfing tham
enchanters have =)

-Leod

-----Original Message-----
From: Garett [mailto:osmosis@...]
Sent: January 30, 2000 5:51 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] So how bad are the changes for us?


From: "Garett" <osmosis@...>

As stated by Verant :

Enchanter's pets are affected by the same change as mage and necro pets,
changing weapons will no longer decrease the attack delay. Enchanters tend
to be a pretty quiet group, so I apologize for overlooking your mention in
the previous messages.

BLAH

Subject: [eqenchanters] So how bad are the changes for us?
